title: This Deal Slashes 15% OFF from the Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 Plus!
description: It comes with a large display and battery in addition to a sleek design. The post This Deal Slashes 15% OFF from the Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 Plus! appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: It comes with a large display and battery in addition to a sleek design.
text: As far as Android tablets are concerned, Samsung undoubtedly makes some of the best devices available on the market right now. `If you’ve been eyeing Samsung’s Galaxy Tab S10 series devices, then now might be the best time for you to grab one – the Galaxy Tab S10 Plus is currently on sale right now, with as much as 15% off from its usual retail price over at Amazon.  In terms of features, the Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 Plus features a 12.4-inch, 2800 x 1752 display, as well as a dual camera setup consisting of a 13MP main and 8MP ultrawide shooter, and 12MP front camera. you’re also getting a rather beefy 10,090 mAh capacity battery on the tablet, making it ideal for lengthy Netflix sessions or all-day web browsing. For software, it comes with Samsung One UI with an exclusive suite of AI features – you can check it out with the link below. Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running.
html:
As far as Android tablets are concerned, Samsung undoubtedly makes some of the best devices available on the market right now. `If you’ve been eyeing Samsung’s Galaxy Tab S10 series devices, then now might be the best time for you to grab one – the Galaxy Tab S10 Plus is currently on sale right now, with as much as 15% off from its usual retail price over at Amazon. 

In terms of features, the Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 Plus features a 12.4-inch, 2800 x 1752 display, as well as a dual camera setup consisting of a 13MP main and 8MP ultrawide shooter, and 12MP front camera. you’re also getting a rather beefy 10,090 mAh capacity battery on the tablet, making it ideal for lengthy Netflix sessions or all-day web browsing. For software, it comes with Samsung One UI with an exclusive suite of AI features – you can check it out with the link below.
